```{r pet imaging}
#| echo: false
#| results: asis
#| eval: !expr (params$kuadrc_pet) | (params$trcds_pet)

cognitiveDecline <- mcrt_decline || dsmse_decline


abeta_df <- BRIDGE21::format_date(abeta_df, !!date_expr)

centiloid <- abeta_df[find_max_date(abeta_df), "centiloid", drop = TRUE]
centiloid_date <- abeta_df[find_max_date(abeta_df), "Date", drop = TRUE]

petScanDescription <- BRIDGE21:::pet_amyloid_description(
  centiloid = centiloid,
  cognitive_decline = cognitiveDecline,
  petScanDate = centiloid_date
)

ltex <- paste(
  #readLines("inst/qmd/sections/imaging/latex/pet.tex"),
  readLines("sections/imaging/latex/pet.tex"),
  collapse = "\n"
)

ltex <- glue::glue(
  ltex,
  petScanImage = "{sections/imaging/latex/images/pet_amyloid.jpeg}",
  centiloid = round(centiloid, 1),
  amyloidHigh = ifelse(centiloid >= 19, "high", "not high"),
  petScanDescription = petScanDescription,
  .open = "{{",
  .close = "}}"
)
cat(paste0("", ltex, ""), sep = "\n")

BRIDGE21::format_quarto(type = "newpage")

```
